properties.Name: RelatedLedgerAccountBalance
properties.Description:
A list of ledger account balances and their related ledger account balances.

An arbitrary way of linking the balance of a ledger account to one or more other ledger account + balances:

AP Balance = Ledger Acct A Balance + Ledger Acct B Balance

Columns.Name: LedgerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated balance is current or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: RelatedLedgerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger.

Columns.Name: RelatedLedgerAccountNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account.

Columns.Name: RelatedTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated balance is current or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: RelatedLedgerAccountBalanceDescription
Columns.Description: A description of the relationship between the related ledger account balances.

Columns.Name: RelatedLedgerAccountBalanceRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Related Account Balance Relationship Type.
